props.name: test
props.description: If enabled, creates a test video with a watermark

props.description: The visibility setting for the video

props.name: brandKitId

props.description: URL of the audio file to be used for the video script (optional)

props.name: input_avatar
props.description: The avatar to be used in the video https://docs.synthesia.io/reference/avatars)

props.name: input_background
props.description: Background for the video. Can be a stock background, custom asset ID, or URL

props.name: test
props.description: If enabled, creates a test video with a watermark
